Package be.ac.kuleuven.cs.ips2.project2002.logicCircuits

Interface Summary
DemoUpdateListener Instances of this type are warned by the LogicCircuit they are registered with when it begins the proces of changing its boolean value, and when it ends that process.
ValueChangedListener ValueChangedListener instances can be registered with a LogicCircuit.
 

Class Summary
And A derived logic circuit that represents the AND of many inputs.
Bit A Bit is an autonomous LogicCircuit whose boolean value is under public control.
LogicCircuit LogicCircuit instances represent electronic logic circuits.
LogicGate Instances of this type represent derived logic circuits.
ManyInputs This class adds support for LogicGates with many inputs.
Not A derived logic circuit, with 1 input, which represents the negation of the input.
Or A logic gate that represents the OR of many inputs.
ValueChangedEvent Instances of this type carry information about a change in the boolean value of a LogicCircuit (see LogicCircuit.getValue()).
